Description:
The FHIR Practitioner resource defines demographics and identifiers for care providers at a health care organization. The Practitioner resource supplements many of the resources within FHIR by providing information about a primary care provider, prescriber, or the clinician involved in ordering a diagnostic test for a patient.

The Practitioner resource corresponds to the following Common Clinical Data Set (CCDS) Elements: Care Team.

The read interaction enables the look up of a Practitioner resource by a constant server ID. The read interaction allows clients to store only the server ID, and with a single request, retrieve the most up-to-date demographics on a practitioner. Read interactions typically begin with a client having previously established a relationship, often through receiving the provider reference as a part of the Patient resource.
SampleResponse:
<Practitioner xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<gender value="female" />

<active value="true" />

<id value="TrTk7Zaw96VJM5sIX95IYHAB" />

<identifier>

<use value="usual" />

<system value="PROVID" />

<value value="97" />

</identifier>

<name>

<text value="Wilson, Helen, MD" />

<family value="Wilson" />

<given value="Helen" />

<given value="Claire" />

</name>

<communication>

<text value="English" />

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.99" />

<code value="en" />

<display value="English" />

</coding>

</communication>

<communication>

<text value="Spanish" />

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.99" />

<code value="es" />

<display value="Spanish" />

</coding>

</communication>

</Practitioner>

ID.Name: ID
ID.Description: The FHIR ID of a practitioner.

name.Name: name
name.Description: The name of the provider, including all prefixes and suffixes available.

practitionerRole.Name: practitionerRole
practitionerRole.Description: The practitioner's role at the organization.

role.Name: role
role.Description: Roles which this practitioner may perform.
